type.title: Please select the type of your ticket.

title.title: Please enter the title of your ticket.

end.title: Thank you for creating a new ticket!
end.description: Support will be with you shortly.

data.title: {TITLE}

manage.permissionError: You must have the "Ticket Bot Manager" role or be the owner to use this command!

select.title: Select a ticket to manage
select.description:
Please refer to the channel of the ticket to manage.
(You can use `#channelname` to refer to a channel.)
select.error: You must type in exactly #<channel>, and you can only refer to channels that exist and are linked to a ticket.

assignees.assignUser: Who do you want to assign? Please @mention that user.
assignees.unassignUser: Who do you want to unassign? Please @mention that user.
assignees.mentionInvalid: You must mention a valid user!

boolean.info: You can react with {YES_EMOJI} to select yes, or {NO_EMOJI} to select no.

double.formatErrorMsg: Please enter a valid floating-point number!
double.minMsg: The minimum value you can enter is `{MIN}`!
double.maxMsg: The maximum value you can enter is `{MAX}`!

integer.minMsg: The minimum value you can enter is `{MIN}`!
integer.maxMsg: The maximum value you can enter is `{MAX}`!

list.emptyListErrorMsg: This list must not be empty!
list.deleteLastEmptyListErrorMsg: You can not delete from an empty list!
list.lengthMsg: You can only enter `{LENGTH}` items at most!
list.info: You can send messages to add to this list, or react to {DELETE_LAST_EMOJI} to delete the last item and {END_EMOJI} to end.

string.lengthMsg: You can only enter `{LENGTH}` characters at most!

one.info: You can react to this message with emojis to select an option.

multi.info: You can react/unreact to this message to select/unselect an option, and react to {EMOTE} to end.
multi.emptyListErrorMsg: You must select at least one option!
multi.lengthMsg: You can only enter `{LENGTH}` items at most!
